item.title: Beam Global S-1
item.description: Beam Global, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC S-1 filing on September 16, 2022 had 15469 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: purchase - 641 instances b - 353 instances stock - 341 instances riley - 335 instances agreement - 332 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
